Aug. 13, 1938 D Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship)
Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship) 10 Test Piece Contest Bridgwater Band Festival bridgwater-band-festival-open-championship
Own Choice from a Specified List
Blake Gardens, Bridgwater, Somerset, England, UK Prizes - 1st £20 and shield, 2nd £14, 3rd £9, 4th £5. March contest - Blaina and District, 2nd Cardiff Corporation Transport. 10 bands competed.
